email_body: So, what is it? And by the way, don't start with the excuses. You're expected to be a full, gourmet cook. Kisses, not music, makes cooking a more enjoyable experience. "Jennifer White" <jenwhite7@zdnetonebox.com> on 10/17/2000 04:19:20 PM To: jarnold@enron.com cc: Subject: Hi I told you I have a long email address. I've decided what to prepare for dinner tomorrow. I hope you aren't expecting anything extravagant because my culinary skills haven't been put to use in a while. My only request is that your stereo works. Music makes cooking a more enjoyable experience. Watch the debate if you are home tonight. I want a report tomorrow... Jen To get your own FREE ZDNet Onebox - FREE voicemail, email, and fax, all in one place - sign up today at http://www.zdnetonebox.com
